contentencoded:
Weekly jobless claims -- which rose slightly to 308,000, were released Thursday morning. 

Diane Swonk, chief economist at Mesirow Financial, joins Marketplace's Mark Garrison to discuss the job outlook and the ongoing budget troubles in Washington. 

Click the audio player above to hear more.

description: Weekly jobless claims rose slightly, but still a bit lower than expected.
teaser: Weekly jobless claims rose slightly, but still a bit lower than expected.
title: Weekly jobless claims rose slightly to 308,000
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, October 3, 2013
